attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ARE YOU SICK OF FUEL PRICES RISING !!!

well something needs to be done about it 

 not only is the price of fuel going up but at the sametime airlines are forced to raise there prices which means that anything shipped to this country like food ,clothing,medical supplies etc will also rise and our wages will never rise at the same pace

it is about time this is addressed something needs to be done now

what will happen in ten twenty years time we could be paying £4/5 pound a liter

why should the people of this country be paying a pound plus per liter when in america they pay nearly the same for a gallon      

so please sign this petition now and show your support and lets see if the goverment will listen to us

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
